caller_intent: Jim York, President of Spencer's Loft Condos HOA, received an unexpected refund check and sought clarification on its origin.
resolution_steps: Gloria checked the caller's policy on the carrier's system.
She identified the refund was likely due to a discount from a full payment plan.
Gloria offered to contact the HOA's owners to confirm the refund's legitimacy.
She requested Jim's cell number for follow-up communication.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance payment plans and discounts
Ability to access and interpret carrier policy details
summary: Jim York received a refund check and contacted Alliance Insurance for clarification. Gloria investigated via the carrier's system, identified the refund likely stemmed from a full payment discount, and planned to verify with HOA owners. She will follow up with Jim after confirmation.
